thread.title: Grammys 2017: James Corden’s Best Moments as Host
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: James Corden’s Best Moments as Host

author: Jason Pham
title: Grammys 2017: James Corden’s Best Moments as Host
text:
James made his grand entrance by falling through the stairs and then rolling down them. That Grammy-worthy rap — Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 13, 2017 That Grammy-worthy rap Advertisement 
The Broadway veteran opened the show with a Hamilton -esque poking fun at the nominees and of course, President Trump Danced so hard, he lost a shoe Danced so hard, he lost a shoe Advertisement 
The Carpool Karaoke host got down so hard in the opening dance sequence that he lost one of his loafers! Showing up in his underwear Showing up in his underwear   Twenty One Pilots dropped trou to accept their Grammy, James stripped down later in the show to join them.
